verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. Maschil of David; when the Ziphites came and said to Saul, Doth not David hide himself with us? Save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O God, by thy name <S%H8034><s%>, And judge <S%H1777><s%> me in thy might <S%H1369><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; Give ear <S%H238><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

For strangers <S%H2114><s%> are risen up <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H6184><s%>, And violent men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>: They have not set <S%H7760><s%> God <S%H430><s%> before them <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
Behold <S%H430><s%>, God is my helper <S%H5826><s%>: The Lord <S%H136><s%> is of them that uphold <S%H5564><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
He will requite <S%H7725><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> unto mine enemies <S%H8324><s%>: Destroy <S%H6789><s%> thou them in thy truth <S%H571><s%>.
With a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%> will I sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto thee <S%H3034><s%>: I will give thanks unto thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, for it is good <S%H2896><s%>.
For he hath delivered <S%H5337><s%> me out of all trouble <S%H6869><s%>; And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> hath seen <S%H7200><s%> my desire upon mine enemies <S%H341><s%>.
